name: 10 Zeptoseconds
description:
Antimatter particles can't live for very long.

Beat each level within 10 seconds or else that cute little block of antimatter will violently implode on itself and send cataclysmic ripples of cosmic destruction through the fabric of spacetime, shredding apart the entire universe as we know it.

(WASD or Arrow Keys to move)

This was a solo project made for the 2021 Riverside GameJam in 7 days. Currently the game is quite short, but I plan to add more levels. Follow my Itch page for updates.

There's currently a few bugs I plan on ironing out pretty soon.

Instagram: @el.niblet

CREDITS:

  • Programmed in Unity
  • All sprites are original and made in Aesprite
  • Sound effects made with LabChirp and BFXR
  • Background music is Cyberpunk Moonlight Sonata (manually sped up), used under the public domain liscense
